thoughts.text: I think I should list the files in a directory related to my code to see if there are any resources or information that could help me improve my code.
thoughts.reasoning: Listing the files in a directory related to my code will allow me to quickly identify any resources or information that could be relevant to improving my code, without having to search through the entire directory.
thoughts.plan:
- List the files in a directory related to my code
- Look for resources or information that could help me to improve my code
- Implement any changes that I think will be beneficial
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure that I am not relying too heavily on the file names and that I am still using my own judgement to determine what changes will be beneficial.
thoughts.speak: I think I should list the files in a directory related to my code to see if there are any resources or information that could help me improve my code.
